required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Anti-CD19 CAR-T Cells for Relapsed or Refractory Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia and Lymphomas
clinical_study.official_title: Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy With Anti-CD19 CAR-T Cells for Relapsed or Refractory Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia and Lymphomas

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single arm, open-label, single center study to determine the safety and efficacy of Anti-CD19 CAR-T cells in patients with relapsed or refractory acute lymphoblastic leukemia and Lymphomas.

detailed_description.textblock: CD19 has been extensively evaluated as a therapeutic target for relapsed or refractory B cell malignancy by chimeric antigen receptor T cell therapy,this is a single arm, open-label, single center study to determine the safety and efficacy of Anti-CD19 CAR-T cells in patients with refractory acute lymphoblastic leukemia and Lymphomas.

primary_outcome.description: Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR+PR ) at 2 months of treatment
Assessment of OS(Overall survival) at 6 months of treatment
Assessment of PFS(Progression-free survival ) at 6 months of treatment
Assessment of MRD negative overall response rate at 3 months of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety (incidence of adverse events defined as dose-limited toxicity)
secondary_outcome.description: Occurrence of study related adverse events defined as NCI CTCAE 4.0 > grade 3 possibly, probably, or definitely related to study treatment.
Expression of CD19 CART cells detected by flow cytometry in blood and bone marrow.
Detection of CD19 CART cells in blood, bone marrow by Quantitative Polymerase Chain Reaction (q-PCR).

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Nangchang University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University
